column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Dropped in for the Monday steak and Texas beer special ($25). The price wasn't bad
column2: but pretty much every part of the plate was just okay. My strip steak had some cartilage along maybe 20% of the cut and my toast was cold when it arrived. With that being said
column3: the ambiance here is great and the beer selection is pretty good. I'd come back if my friends suggested it for happy hour
column4: but I'll steer clear of the Monday steak special in the future.
